manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vetacsion 4 Pack (2* Large;2*Small) Magnetic Metal Washing Machine Shelf,Matt Black A great way to save extras storage space - hanging racks provide free up countertop or cabinet space - perfect for holding spice jars,seasoning containers,cans,utensils,and even books - keep your kitchen well organized - versatile use wall mount storageThe black spice rack can be installed on metal surfaces,would not gradually slide down.such as dryer,ovens,cupboard,pets grooming shop,dishwashers,fridge,classroom whiteboards,rvs,etc.; it can store vitamins,salt shakers,olive oil,coffee,tea bags,cleaning supplies,markers,erasers,office supplies,dog’s treats etc.The 4 Pack magnetic storage set include 2* large;2*small basket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These things rock!
reviews.reviewText: I'd add photos however I have gone flip phone....I'm over the smartphone tech.....These things work great over my sink....on my fridge and in the lockers I have all over the house for modern storage....The magnets are quite strong...not gonna lie. Holds books in the lockers (I'm a reader)....Hold gym weights....holding 12lbs without slipping....easy to clean and really not all that easy to remove....so yeah....they're sturdy with ZERO sticky mess like the glue strip junk")

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AWESOME spice shelves
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure how these would work out but they are truly awesome! Super strong magnets. I haven’t had any sliding or moving and they hold a good amount of spices.I would definitely buy again and recommend getting these spice racks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very powerful magnets, make the shelves worthy of buying. Well made, several sizes, holds all of my collections of coffee cups. The price is right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and the magnet is so STRONG!
reviews.reviewText: Love this! New easily accessible spice rack on the side of my fridge! Now all my heavily utilized spices are eye level and it looks so cute! And the magnets are really REALLY strong! I have a jar of molasses and homemade vanilla in them and so many spice and it doesn’t sag! It’s so strong!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these magnetic shelves
reviews.reviewText: I got these as my kitchen cabinets are small and finding my spices was a nightmare. Bought a lazy Susan& realized after I received it that it wasn’t going to work. Found these shelves & they were just what I needed. They are strong magnets and stay where you put them. There are 2 different sizes, so you have to be careful that you have enough room to put whatever items in it. They wouldn’t work well for bigger items as they aren’t very wide or deep. But are perfect to put my spices on the side of my fridge. Handy while cooking too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for IKEA spice jars
reviews.reviewText: We love these racks! The magnet is strong and sturdy and seems like it can hold a decent amount of weight. They hold 3 IKEA spice jars perfectly which is great for storing our whole spices we use for grinding in our mortar and pestle. The black blends in nicely with the color of our fridge. We have 3 on one side and use the last one on the other side for extra storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars not wide enough
reviews.reviewText: It's a great product but could be improved. You get four magnetic spice racks - two slightly shorter than the other two. I wouldn't have minded all 4 to be the same length, as the size difference is minimal, and the shorter racks don't have a benefit. Since they do differ in size though, it would have been great if two of the racks were wider, rather than shorter. As a matter of fact, it would be great if all 4 racks were slightly wider.I can fit a regular sized spice container, and even a slightly larger one, but not two in terms of width. Yet there is unused space in the width area. So recommendation would be to either make them slightly narrower to fit one spice container, or wider, to fit two containers. Otherwise these racks are great: they look good and have great magnetic adhesion. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, love, love
reviews.reviewText: These are solid, hold really well on my fridge and look great. I was annoyed that the sizes are different, but after getting the package, they all do that so they nest for shipping costs. It is a minimum difference and not too noticeable by sight . The larger 2 hold a wide mouth mason jar and the smaller ones do not so there is a definite difference in what you can put in them. I've found glass jars that fit - old square decaf coffee containers - so I've found a solution. Would be better to have all the same size, so that's my only complaint.I'm shocked at how useful they are for our kitchen and how much clutter they removed from the counters. I've put all our drink items - tea, hot chocolate, coffee, sugar, etc on the fridge next to the counter with our electric kettle. Wish I had found these years ago.

reviews.reviewTitle: Holds all the frequently used kitchen items
reviews.reviewText: It is on the side of the fridge and holds jars and bottles of sauce, spices etc. well. It stays in place solidly. Pleased with it.
